text.section: The Board may establish a Maryland Broker-Dealer College Investment Plan.

The purpose of the Broker-Dealer Plan is to provide for a broker-dealer distributed vehicle that would allow contributions to an investment account established for the purposes of meeting the qualified higher education expenses of the qualified designated beneficiary of the account.

section.section: The Board shall administer, manage, and promote the Broker-Dealer Plan.
The Board shall administer the Broker-Dealer Plan in compliance with Internal Revenue Service standards for qualified State tuition programs.
The Board shall adopt any other procedures that the Board considers necessary to carry out the provisions of this subtitle.
